page.title: 03STORNOWAY SOUTH - RECREATION
page.content: There is a{sports centre}where you can go swimming and you can book the games hall for tennis,football,basketball, badminton and netball.There is a snack bar upstairs with table tennis and two big windows to watch the people swimming and also the games hall. Beside the sports centre there is a small building where you can play squash. You can go to the sea-angling club where you go fishing in a group or on your own. There is also water skiing. {SPORTS CLUBS:} Stornoway Canoeing club,Stornoway Sea Angling Club,Stornoway Gymnastics Club,Stornoway Karate Club,Stornoway and District Rugby Football Association,Stornoway Squash Club, Western Isles Amateur Swimming club.
